name: morcellation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of breaking body tissue, bone, etc. into very small pieces so it can be removed from the body: The efficiency of tissue removal improved, particularly with morcellation. The average operating time including morcellation was 97 minutes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe myoma is freed from its base attachment and removed using a morcellation technique.Retained uterine tissue has been reported, usually after morcellation.During mechanical tissue morcellation, 0.9% of saline solution was used as irrigation fluid.
